title: Crime Alert 08.31.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.31.18
description:
Paul Manafort says he won't get a fair trial if it's held in DC. Mom forgets her special needs child in the car after shopping. A teen boy runs away after seeing his father's murder. A year later he's found safe.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
